Name: Deadly Strike
Dis: Deal 750k DMG to the Siege Target. If the Siege Target is below 25% HP, deal an extra 1500k DMG.

Name: Serial Pursuit
Dis: Deal DMG equal to 10% of DMG already inflicted to the Siege Target.

Name: Heavy Bombardment
Dis: Siege Target deals up to 8% of Max HP

Name: Agile Ambush
Dis: Siege Target deals up to 8% of Current HP

Name: Battle Cry
Dis: Deal 1000k DMG to the Siege Target

Name: Skill Charge
Dis: Increase the effect of the next Stronghold Skill by 2.5x
